data.title: Historical Persons
data.meta_description: Index of significant historical persons appearing in theatrically-released feature films
data.text:
Note : The following annotated index, exclusively created by the author, shows significant historical persons appearing in theatrically-released feature films (chiefly U.S. and British releases, along with notable foreign productions, showing U.S. year of release), as well as feature films made-for-TV, TV series and miniseries, but does not include shorts, documentaries or video productions. Persons are presented alphabetically by last and first name and titles of films are sequentially presented in alphabetical and chronological order. Titles shown in boldface (which will interface to the actual full-text entries on this database) represent entries profiled in Jay Robert Nash's Internet Movie Database, with the actor or actress enacting the character shown following parenthesis after each entry.
